resources.string: This will show you comment from one week ago.
This will show you comment from six days ago.
This will show you comment from five days ago.
This will show you comment from four days ago.
This will show you comment from three days ago.
This will show you comment from two days ago.
This will show you comment from yesterday.
This will allow you to add comment to your current mood.
This will take you to the history page, where you can check your moods from last week.
